DbDetails.DbTable: tms.xtmst_vehiclerealtime x left join tms.xtmsc_type_option x0 on x.deliverymode=x0.typecode left join tms.xtmsc_type_option x1 on x.consignmentmode=x1.typecode left join tms.xtmsm_operateline x2 on x.operateineid=x2.operateineid left join tms.xtmsm_master_city x3 on x.fromcityid=x3.cityid left join tms.xtmsm_master_city x4 on x.tocityid=x4.cityid left join tms.xtmsm_xsite x5 on x.fromxsiteid=x5.xsiteid left join tms.xtmsm_xsite x6 on x.toxsiteid=x6.xsiteid left join tms.xtmsm_vehicle x7 on x.vehicleid=x7.vehicleid left join tms.xtmsm_driver x8 on x.driverid=x8.driverid left join tms.xtmsm_driver x9 on x.lorrydriver=x9.driverid left join tms.xtmsc_status_option x10 on x.status=x10.statuscode
DbDetails.Data: x.vehiclerealtimecode,x0.TypeName deliverymode,x1.TypeName consignmentmode,x2.operateline_name operateineid,x3.CityAllName fromcityid,x4.CityAllName tocityid,x5.XSiteName fromxsiteid,x6.XSiteName toxsiteid,x.fromaddress,x.toaddress,x7.Platenumber vehicleid,x8.DriverName driverid,x9.DriverName lorrydriver,x10.StatusName status,x.freightnum,x.totalweight,x.totalvolumn,x.remainweight,x.remainvolumn,x.carrierid,x.vehiclerealtimeid,x.createby,x.createdate,x.updateby,x.updatedate,x.depotnum,x.startdatetime,x.startdatetimeactual,x.terminatedatetime,x.terminatedatetimeactual
